name: Yandere-Chan
summary: In this short story, you assume the role of a new transfer student (Whom you can name) that catches the attention of a strange, reclusive girl, who claims to have met you at some point in the past. You don't know where or when you allegedly met her, and in time you may end up wishing you never met her at all... because she is literally crazy for you. In the typical "yandere" themed visual novel, the number of bad ends you can reach will far outweigh the good ones. However, in this game there is ONLY one good end.
